level.text: Substantial modification of a Certificate application requires withdrawal of the original application and submission of a new application reflecting the modifications.

For the purposes of this section, a change of ten percent (10%) or more from the applicant’s original operating budget or a change in ownership shall be deemed to be a substantial modification. The Commission may deem other examples as substantial modifications of the application.

The new application shall constitute a wholly separate application and shall be subject to all elements of the review process, including written notification proceedings, unless waived by the Commission.
